category: Jury Committee Regulations/Article 19 (Conducting training for each member sport group)
contents: Article 19 (Implementation of training by member sport organization) ① Member sport organizations must establish and operate their own training plan for referees on a regular basis every year. ② The training content must be conducted in accordance with the circumstances of each organization, including group training, refresher training, lectures, referee activities and ethics, fair game operation and decisions, and referees' responsibility, etc., general education courses, regulations, game rules, judging theory, and practical training. .
